privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At BJJLink, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
privacy.section1-content: We collect information you provide directly to us, including: name, email, profile photos, sports achievement information, social media links, and other information you choose to share in your portfolio.
privacy.section2-content: We use your information to: (a) provide and improve our services; (b) create and manage your portfolio; (c) process payments; (d) send important communications about your account; (e) personalize your experience on the platform.
privacy.section3-content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information only in the following situations: (a) with your explicit consent; (b) to comply with legal obligations; (c) with service providers who assist us in operating the platform.
privacy.section4-content: We implement technical and organizational security measures to protect your information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. We use SSL encryption and secure data storage.
privacy.section5-content: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve your experience, analyze platform usage, and personalize content. You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings.
privacy.section6-content: You have the right to: (a) access your personal information; (b) correct inaccurate information; (c) request deletion of your information; (d) export your data; (e) revoke previously given consents.
privacy.section7-content: We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to provide our services and comply with legal obligations. When you delete your account, we will remove your information from our active systems.
privacy.section8-content: BJJLink is not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect information from children. If we become aware that we have collected information from a child, we will take steps to delete that information.
privacy.section9-content: Your information may be transferred to and maintained on servers located outside your country of residence. By using BJJLink, you consent to this transfer.
privacy.section10-content: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. We will notify you of significant changes via email or notice on the platform.
privacy.section11-content: For privacy questions or to exercise your rights, please contact us at contato@bjjlink.com.br

01.question: What is BjjLink?
01.answer: BjjLink is a platform created for athletes to centralize their sports journey in a single link, with a professional profile: achievements, social networks and content.

02.question: Can I use BjjLink for free?
02.answer: Yes. You can create your portfolio for free and have access to basic features to present your online profile.

03.question: What changes in the monthly plan?
03.answer: The monthly plan unlocks advanced features such as complete profile customization, visual highlight, personalized link and more space to showcase your career and achievements.

04.question: Do I need technical knowledge to use it?
04.answer: No. The platform was designed to be simple and intuitive. You create and edit your portfolio without needing technical knowledge.

05.question: Can I cancel the monthly plan whenever I want?
05.answer: Yes. The monthly plan has no commitment and can be canceled at any time.

06.question: Who is BjjLink for?
06.answer: BjjLink is ideal for athletes, coaches, competitors and content creators who want to position themselves better in the sport and strengthen their personal brand.
